author: jboynes
msg: The serialized form of this class means that system flags need to be implemented as a bitmap.
Also, user flags need to serialized as a Hashtable, so it seems simpler to store them that way.

author: quinlan
msg: not mutable until we get it working

author: dolander
msg: Add a new JavaScript support tag.  The ScriptBlock allows JavaScript to be inserted either
before or after the framework generated JavaScript.  This tag is necessary if you want to
write HTML through JavaScript and keep the HTML/XHTML generated legal. (It's not legal for
the <script> tag to appear after the body, but because the end body tag commonly writes out the
framework JavaScript, there is no way without this tag to insert <script> after the framework
created JavaScript but before the </body> tag.
In addition, we support placement directly before the framework generated script and also inline.
Added a smoke test which has not yet been added to the DRTs.

author: jm
msg: make an eval out of the inner loop of h-f; 20% faster
